data.persona: I love going around the world.  There is so much to learn when I travel.  Meeting people around the world is a joy.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a paper, a Scroll, a magical lights, a painting, an a pen, a tome, an a desk, and an a table here.
The roach and the a cat are here.

You are carrying a map and an tattered map, wearing a shoes, and wielding a Kings sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the roaches and the cat
data.mid_motivation: I plan to  use their help to search the wizard's quarters today
data.long_motivation: I hope to take magical treasures with me to my region

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get A scroll and a magical lights
